titles.title: TRICARE PAR Study Act
To direct the Secretary of Defense to conduct a study on reimbursement rates for mental health care providers under the TRICARE program.
TRICARE PAR Study Act
TRICARE Payment And Reimbursement Study Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
TRICARE Payment And Reimbursement Study Act or the TRICARE PAR Study Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense to study the impact of using established rates under TRICARE to reimburse mental health providers.
The Government Accountability Office must assess the feasibility of recommendations identified in the report.
